FuncDef: The display pim ipv6 rp-info command displays information about the Rendezvous Point (RP) to which multicast groups correspond. The display pim ipv6 rp-info command displays information about the Rendezvous Point (RP) to which multicast groups correspond. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
CLIs: display pim ipv6 { vpn-instance <instance-name> | all-instance } rp-info [ <ipv6-group-address> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a multicast group address.
The value ranges from FF00:: to FFFF:FFFF:FFFF:FFFF: FFFF:FFFF:FFFF:FFFF, in hexadecimal notation.

Specifies the name of a VPN instance.
The value is a string of case-sensitive characters.
